properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 5:32AM EST until January 12 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
West central Caldwell County in western North Carolina...
Central Burke County in western North Carolina...

* Until 1130 AM EST Sunday.

* At 528 AM EST, a stream gauge on Johns River north of Morganton
indicated the river was cresting at minor flood stage. Minor
flooding is expected to continue through the morning.

* The main impacts will be to low lying roads and recreation areas
immediately along Johns River and some if its tributaries. This
includes portions of Johns River Rd and Corpening Bridge Rd and
camping areas along Lower Creek.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Only when it is safe to do so, please report floodwaters or
landslides flowing over roads or threatening property to the National
Weather Service by calling toll-free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, by
posting on our Facebook page, or via Twitter using hashtag NWSGSP.
Your message should describe the event and the specific location
where it occurred, including roadways, nearby cross streets, stream
names, and other landmarks.
